attributes.action: re-open the railway line between Leicester and Burton on trent via coalville
attributes.additional_details: re-open the railway line between Leicester and Burton on trent via coalville the bus service is crap and 500 or more new homes are being built near the line the track is already there it's a freight only line you would only need to build the stations and this line was ment to re-open before but you keep saying it's going to happen then it's not then  it is now it's not make up your mind the line needs to be re-opened spend all that thousands of pounds you promised for the railways and use the money to re-open the line
